page.title: 14School-girls Rhymes.
page.content:
Little girls at school picking the daises and making daisy chains. Playing ring a ring of roses and skipping round in circles. "Ring a ring of roses,a pocket full of poses, a tissue a tissue we all fall down." Another game was cats got the measles. "Cats got the measles,the measles,the measles,cats got the measles,the measles got the cats." The girls play chase with the boys. "Ip dip,sky blue,who's it? Not you." This would tell the children who would be chasing them. Once you were touched by the chaser, you would automatically become the chaser instead.
Written by {Lucy Hook.}
